languages.text: {n}Глаза Джай изумленно распахиваются.{/n} "Я не хотела оскорбить вас, шерин. Это была... шалость. Впрочем, если она ранила ваше сердце, я смиренно принимаю строгий приговор. Простите меня".
{n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was just... a bit of fun. But if it hurt you, I will humbly accept the harshest punishment. Forgive me."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза Джай изумленно распахиваются.{/n} "Я не хотела оскорбить вас, шерин. Это была... шалость. Впрочем, если она ранила ваше сердце, я смиренно принимаю строгий приговор. Простите меня".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was... a bit of mischief. But if it wounded your heart, I will humbly accept the strict punishment. Forgive me."
{n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was... a bit of mischief. But if it wounded your heart, I will humbly accept the strict punishment. Forgive me."
{n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was just... a bit of mischief. But if it hurt you, I will humbly accept the strict punishment. Forgive me."
{n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was just... a bit of mischief. But if it hurt you, I will humbly accept the strict punishment. Forgive me."
{n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was just... a bit of fun. But if it hurt you, I will humbly accept the harshest punishment. Forgive me."
{n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was just... a bit of fun. But if it hurt you, I will humbly accept the harshest punishment. Forgive me."

languages.text: {n}Jae écarquille les yeux de stupéfaction.{/n} « Je n'ai jamais voulu vous offenser, shereen. Ce n'était... qu'une petite farce, mais si elle vous a {mf|blessé|blessée}, j'accepte humblement tout châtiment que vous jugerez bon de m'infliger. Pardonnez-moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was just... a bit of fun. But if it hurt you, I will humbly accept the harshest punishment. Forgive me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae écarquille les yeux de stupéfaction.{/n} « Je n'ai jamais voulu vous offenser, shereen. Ce n'était... qu'une petite farce, mais si elle vous a {mf|blessé|blessée}, j'accepte humblement tout châtiment que vous jugerez bon de m'infliger. Pardonnez-moi. »

languages.text: {n}婕伊震惊地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“我并不是有意冒犯你，亲爱的。这只是……小小的恶作剧罢了，但如果它伤害了你的感情，我愿意谦卑地接受最严厉的惩罚。请你原谅我。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was just... a bit of fun. But if it hurt you, I will humbly accept the harshest punishment. Forgive me."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊震惊地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“我并不是有意冒犯你，亲爱的。这只是……小小的恶作剧恶意，但如果它伤害了你的感情，我愿意谦卑地接受严厉的惩罚。请你原谅我。”

languages.text: {n}Jaes Augen weiten sich vor Erstaunen.{/n} "Ich wollte Euch nicht beleidigen, Shereen. Das war nur ... ein kleiner Spaß. Aber wenn es Euch verletzt hat, akzeptiere ich demütig die strengste Bestrafung. Vergebt mir."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was just... a bit of fun. But if it hurt you, I will humbly accept the harshest punishment. Forgive me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jaes Augen weiten sich vor Erstaunen.{/n} "Ich wollte Euch nicht beleidigen, Shereen. Es war nur ... ein wenig Schabernack. Doch wenn es Euch verletzt hat, akzeptiere ich demütig die strenge Bestrafung. Vergebt mir."

languages.text: {n}Jae, atónita, abre los ojos de par en par.{/n} «No pretendía ofenderle, shereen. Solo fue... una pequeña travesura. Pero si le he hecho daño, aceptaré el castigo que me merezco. Perdóneme».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was just... a bit of fun. But if it hurt you, I will humbly accept the harshest punishment. Forgive me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, atónita, abre los ojos de par en par.{/n} «No pretendía ofenderte, shereen. Solo fue... una pequeña travesura. Pero si te he hecho daño, aceptaré el castigo que me merezco. Perdóname».

languages.text: {n}ジェイの目は驚きで大きく見開かれていた。{/n}「怒らせるつもりはなかったの、シャリーン。ただの…ちょっとしたイタズラのつもりだったのよ。でも、傷つけてしまったのなら、厳しい罰を謙虚に受け入れるわ。どうか許してちょうだい」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was just... a bit of fun. But if it hurt you, I will humbly accept the harshest punishment. Forgive me."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの目は驚きで大きく見開かれていた。{/n}「怒らせるつもりはなかったの、シャリーン。ただの…ちょっとしたイタズラのつもりだったのよ。でも、傷つけてしまったのなら、厳しい罰を謙虚に受け入れるわ。どうか許してちょうだい」

languages.text: {n}Jae'ın gözleri hayretle açılıyor.{/n} "Seni kızdırmayı hiç istememiştim şirinim. Birazcık eğlenecektim ama seni üzdüysem en sert cezayı bile boynumu eğerek kabul ederim. Affet beni."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "I never meant to offend you, shereen. It was just... a bit of fun. But if it hurt you, I will humbly accept the harshest punishment. Forgive me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae'ın gözleri hayretle açılıyor.{/n} "Seni kızdırmayı hiç istememiştim şirinim. Sadece birazcık eğleniyordum ama eğer seni üzdüysem en sert cezayı bile boynumu eğerek kabul ederim. Affet beni."
